shouldDetectShutDownHang.desc:: Whether to kill the server when shutdown takes too long. default: true

maxShutDownTime.desc:: The maximum time the shutdown is allowed to take. default: 120s

printThreads.desc:: Print remaining threads to log? default:true

shouldAutoShutDown.desc:: Whether to use the timed shutdown default: true

disconnectMessage.desc:: Set the disconnect message for the players

shouldDetectHang.desc:: Whether to detect and close the server hang during runtime default: true

shutdownMessages.desc:: Shutting down timed messages, format: [secondsToShutdown;Message] e.g. ["300;Server is restarting in 5min","150;Server is restarting in 2.5min"]
